title: Son Heung-min Nominated for Ballon d'Or
text:
Son Heung-min of Tottenham Hotspur has been nominated for the Ballon d'Or, an annual award honoring the best player in all European leagues.

France Football, the French weekly that presents the prestigious award, on Tuesday announced its list of 30 finalists.

Son is the only Asian player on the shortlist, which also includes Sergio Agüero of Manchester City, Lionel Messi of Barcelona, Cristiano Ronaldo of Juventus and Virgil van Dijk of Liverpool.

The winner is determined by a vote among football journalists, as well as national team coaches and captains.
